paragraphs: I'm close this time. It's frustrating that I still have not discovered the infection's source. Something in the food, the water? An animal? There are many mysteries in Blackreach. Perhaps I will never know.
But if I can cleanse our sanctuary, I'll be a hero! Not like Tranya and Skor, of course, but maybe at least half as heroic. It feels good to put my skills to use again. Now, on to the recipe itself.
